synthesis_conditions.porous_network: 3D porous network containing a distorted butterfly-like pore window

synthesis_conditions.irradiation_source: X-ray sources (MoKa, l = 0.71073 c, 40 W, or CuKa, l = 1.54178 c, 40 W)
synthesis_conditions.recovery_time: 60 s when stopping irradiation and placing the sample in air
synthesis_conditions.local_structural_adjustment: O···N distance from 4.288(6) c (blm-Co) to 4.166(5) c (blm-Co-X)

synthesis_conditions.initial_material: powdered crystalline blm-Co sample mixed with polymer gel (Pattex clear epoxy adhesive)
